name: Ping (itch) (GameJMunk)
description:
This is the game we have all been waiting for. Ping!

A remake of the original classic Pong by Atari, but free, and with it's own touch of multiplayer, ai, and difficulty.

And best of all: zero ping!

Please Note that this game is clone/fangame of the original "Pong" which is owned by Atari.
